msbt.message: I gotta get this place shipshape, sharpish, !Oh, who am I kiddingthis is gonna take me days! What have I gotten myself into?It's really dumb because you came by to talk to me, but stumbled into my disaster area!Tell you whatâ€”swing by tomorrow. Things'll be in much better shape I hope.
I really wanna get out and explore but my stuff's not gonna unpack itself.Plus, my buddies helped me pack, so I have no idea what's in which box.

How do I have this much stuff?! I live alone!I even got rid of a bunch of things before I moved. And still!Where am I gonna put all this junk? I gotta come up with something or I won't have a place for my bed!
I'm on a mission to conquer this junk pile today! But honestly, I get tired just looking at it.But I'm gonna do it RIGHT or my name's not !But I reeeeeally don't wanna
I've been at this all day and I don't think I've even made a dent.I wonder if I could convince some old buddies to ship out here and help,
When'd it get dark? How long have I been doing this?Was there ever a time when I wasn't unpacking? I don't even know anymoreI can't stop now thoughI do NOT wanna wake up to more of this.
OK, noggintime to think! What's gonna go where
If I put this here, and that there No, that won't fit. What if Ino.Slugs! This is tough.
Maybe I could just throw everything wherever. I mean why not? It'd be a mess, but it'd be MY mess!
I'm kind of in the middle of figuring out where to put my stuff. What fun!
